note.p: Career: Fought for Italy against Austria (1848-1849); Mathematical Master, Cremona; Mathematical Master, Milan; Professor of Higher Geometry, Bologna (1860); Professor of Higher Geometry, Milan (1866); Professor of Higher Mathematics, Rome, and organised the College of Engineering (1873)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1905 vol 75 pp 277-279 signed by G B M
